If you are doing it just to grief your team and for no other reason then it is.

If you genuinely believe that is what you need to do to win then it is fine, and sometimes even necessary.

I would suggest telling your team what you are doing and to play safe in a polite way if that is your strat. Communication is key.
this is more or less what im asking. at what point does it become griefing?

What do you mean with "at what point"?
There's no point at which something magically becomes griefing. Either you are trying to piss of your team / make your team lose with your decision to afk farm, or you're not.

I hope not.  If my team is losing hard and they want to teamfight anyways, I'll completely ignore their requests for help.  I try to farm myself back into the game instead of throwing the game in one wanna-be epic teamfight.

Sorry, when it's 8-25 I'm not helping you in a teamfight.  I'm farming and waiting the game out so gold balances.
No its not. If your team is feeding REALLY hard, and your not fed, then your best chance is to AFK farm so you can carry late. Otherwise your boned.
